channel.title: I've looked everyone
channel.description: How do i change max levels.... I googled it, searched it, and turned the box upside down and i still cant find it... please help :]

item.title: I've looked everyone
item.dc:creator: @r_r_r r r r
item.description:
@r_r_r wrote:

Its probably because you need to change the part where it says if (exp > 13034430) just make that A higher number.

Read full topic

item.title: I've looked everyone
item.dc:creator: @shaneman24 shaneman24
item.description:
@shaneman24 wrote:

Thank you so much i’ll try this out right now :] rep+ for you (rofl idk how to give rep)

EDIT: I got the bottom number to change like it says 99/130

edit2: i went into character’s and changed mine to 130 now…It works but idk if the other players will have the problem I guess i have to test it now lolz

edit3: i made anothr account and got it to 99 but once it got to 99 it went from 99 to 130 lols

Read full topic

item.title: I've looked everyone
item.dc:creator: @r_r_r r r r
item.description:
@r_r_r wrote:

I’am pretty sure this is for all servers. Open client.java

Search for this.

	public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

You should see something like this.

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 99; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl;
Just change the two 99’s there into a higher number, not sure how high you can go and I don’t now if you have to change EXP also

Read full topic
